comments.body:
Until we get the pre-cached artifacts downloaded, this command should be updated so that it checks if a local engine is being used with arm64, and throws otherwise. Otherwise the tool will likely crash when it cannot find the binaries to build for these.

(See https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/396cd247708f91342070bf292d2cc34315a06c2e/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/artifacts.dart#L219 )
Alternately we could land the engine side (building, uploading) first; that's how we did all of the desktop bringup.
Either approach is fine with me
Actually, that change will make the rest of this function dead code. Nevermind, you can leave it.
